fulfillment noun [U]
(SATISFACTION)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a feeling of happiness because you are doing what you intended to do in life: Workaholics can only find fulfillment in their work.
fulfillment noun [U]
(DOING SOMETHING PROMISED)
the act of doing something that you have promised or intended to do: Morales said that owning his own home was the fulfillment of a dream.
